meanings.definition: The state or quality of being transient.
meanings.sent1: The transience of the seasons reminds us of the constant change in nature.
meanings.sent2: I pondered the transience of life as I watched the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The transience of the butterfly's flight brought a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, a moment of transience in the stillness.
meanings.sent5: The transience of the morning mist painted a fleeting picture of beauty.

meanings.definition: The transient nature or quality of something.
meanings.sent1: We marveled at the transience of the shooting star streaking across the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The transience of happiness can make us appreciate joyful moments even more.
meanings.sent3: The transience of the bubbles in my soda made me giggle.
meanings.sent4: His words hung in the air, their transience leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The transience of childhood is a bittersweet reminder of growing up.
